biography: Martin is a highly accomplished golfer who calls St. Laurence Golf his home club.

His consistent performance has made him a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, having participated in the prestigious tournament every year since 2022.  Prior to that, Martin's exceptional talent was already evident.

His accolades speak for themselves; he is a past champion of the Hector Trophée, having secured victory in 2020.  Furthermore, Martin's individual skill earned him the coveted Victor trophy at Hector Trophée VI, highlighting his prowess as a single player.
With his experience and demonstrable talent, Martin is always a strong contender and a player to watch each year at the Hector Trophée.
